recipesJson.name: Vanilla Custard Cornbread Pudding
recipesJson.author: DIYorDIEMixathon
recipesJson.description: Creme Brule and VCCC are used for a rich custard base.  Vanilla pudding and marshmallow are used for a sweet vanilla pudding with a smooth mouth feel.  Slight toasted note to the corn bread from the CB.

reviews.text: Lightly flavored but its good. Iâ€™ll tweak the percentages and try to get it more to my likings
